Antonio Conte has admitted that his threat to quit Tottenham after a defeat at Burnley in February was a premeditated stunt to try and prompt change at the club.
Conte's Spurs are only a point behin… [+3550 chars]

articles.author: Adam Shergold, Craig Hope
articles.title: Newcastle United fans torn over new away kit in Saudi Arabia colours - Daily Mail
articles.description: The new design it features the Newcastle crest coloured in green on a white background, with the collar and sleeve trims also in green. It looks very similar to the kit Saudi Arabia wear.
articles.content:
Newcastle United have come under fire from fans offended by their 'awful' new away kit in the green and white of Saudi Arabia - but plenty are willing to buy and wear it. 
Some supporters are happy … [+5948 chars]
